columns.name: workload_id
columns.description: The ID assigned to the workload.

columns.name: permission_type
columns.description: Permission granted on a workload share.

columns.name: share_id
columns.description: The ID associated with the workload share.

columns.name: shared_with
columns.description: The Amazon Web Services account ID, IAM role, organization ID, or organizational unit (OU) ID with which the workload is shared.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The status of a workload share.

columns.name: status_message
columns.description: Optional message to compliment the Status field.
